This is an undergraduate level class at the University of Ottawa taugh by [Julien Martin][lab_website]

When and where:

- Lectures:
    - Mondays 1:00-2:20 pm in SMD 224
    - Wednesdays 11:30 am-12:50 pm in SMD 224
- Labs
    - Wednesday 2:30-5:30 in in LPR 155



# Course info

* [Lecture slides](lectures.qmd)
* [Practical manual][manual]
* [Syllabus](syllabus.qmd)


# Requirements

<!-- * Download and install [Git](https://git-scm.com/downloads). -->

* You will need a recent version of R (4.0.0 or highher)

* Install [`R`][cran] and your favourite R IDE [`RStudio`][rstudio_d] or [`VSCode`][vscode_d]
